articles.author: Nicola Slawson, Joanna Partridge
articles.title: UK Covid live news: country in ‘perilous moment’, says former chief scientific adviser - The Guardian
articles.description: Boris Johnson will need to use data to make a decision well before planned restriction easing on 21 June, says Prof Sir Mark Walport

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Daniel Boulton: Manhunt after mother and son found dead in Louth - BBC News
articles.description: Officers seek Daniel Boulton, 29, after a 26-year-old woman and nine-year-old boy are found stabbed.
articles.content:
image copyrightLincolnshire Police
image captionPolice urged the public not to approach Daniel Boulton but instead to phone 999
A manhunt has been launched after a mother and her nine-year-old son … [+1473 chars]
